combined_query: SELECT MAP.TIMEOUT, APP.APP_NAME, APP.COUNTRY, APP.INPUT_FLDR_PATH, APP.FLOW_PATH, APP.CLASSIFIER_PATH, APP.OUTPUT_FILE_FOLDER, APP.MIME_TYPE, ENV.ACT_URL, ENV.ACT_ACS_TKN FROM OCR_CLIENTS CLI, OCR_CONS_APP_ENV_MAP MAP, OCR_APP_MASTER APP, OCR_ENV_MASTER ENV WHERE CLIENT_ID = '{}' AND CLIENT_SECRET = '{}' AND CLI.CONSUMER_ID = MAP.CONSUMER_ID AND APP.APP_ID = MAP.APP_ID AND ENV.ENV_ID = MAP.ENV_ID {} {}
